CHAT.comment: Chi. 20 winthrop street hyde park M.A. 11;3.91 to my best cousind Kathy Hribar when you get here I will savelots of candies for you and me and don't forget your Baby Brother John paul. thank you and when you come you could hold our hammsters. thenk you againe

MOT gets Chi started with some suggestions and is very formal about where to write the return address and date; Mot coaches a lot about how capital letters are used , etc; once the heading is finished , Chi works independently , stopping a few times to ask for spelling; so most of the main text was Chi's idea; at end Mot explains that if something is misspelled she (Kathy) won't understand what she (Chi) is trying to say!; Mot ends up doing reading back of letter

u.a: the number and street where they live
tries to get Bro and his friend who is making lots_of noise to leave the room . Bro continues to talk loudly making it difficult to hear Mot and Chi .
carefully pronounces amd writes each word
a reward from school for reading achievement
refers to letter where Chi has written my instead of me
can hear Bro and dishes rattling in the background during the silence as Chi writes
Chi talking to self as writes , in background
talks to Bro who is making lost of noise in the background with a walkie talkie
BRO still talking some in background
maybe thinks mother was asking something about your
Chi has spelled again as aggine
point to the first a in again
a big crash in the background
maybe the my/me problem from earlier
Chi ready to move on , talking to INV2 about picture
